contentrichtext.text: {{For|the town in Austria|Ruden, Austria}} '''Ruden''' is a small island in the [[Baltic Sea]], located between [[Rügen]] and [[Usedom]] off the German coast. Ruden belongs to the municipality of [[Kröslin]], in the [[German state]] (''Bundesland'') of [[Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania]]. Before the [[storm tide]] of [[All Saints' Flood (1304)|All Saints Day in 1304]], Ruden was probably part of a land bridge between Usedom and Rügen. Today, the Ruden is a [[nature reserve]]. {{Coord|54|12|N|13|46|E|region:DE_type:isle|display=title}} {{German Baltic Sea islands}} [[Category:Islands of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern]] [[Category:Nature reserves in Mecklenburg-Vorpommern]] [[Category:Bay of Greifswald]] {{VorpommernGreifswald-geo-stub}}
